data.trans_hint: Các bức ảnh cũ nên được giữ trong kho lưu trữ của gia đình.
data.en_hint: The old photographs should be kept in the family archive.
data.content_game_1: The old photographs should be kept in the family archive.
data.answer_en_hint: The old photographs should be kept in the family archive.

data.trans: Sự tiêu thụ, sự tiêu dùng
data.trans_hint: Hầu hết các sản phẩm của chúng tôi được sản xuất cho tiêu dùng trong nước hơn là xuất khẩu.
data.en_hint: Most of our products are made for domestic consumption rather than export.
data.content_game_1: Most of our products are made for domestic consumption rather than export.
data.answer_en_hint: Most of our products are made for domestic consumption rather than export.

data.trans_hint: Tôi phải bỏ lại chiếc xe ở bên vệ đường.
data.en_hint: I had to abandon the car by the side of the road.
data.content_game_1: I had to abandon the car by the side of the road.
data.answer_en_hint: I had to abandon the car by the side of the road.

data.trans_hint: Anh ấy nổi tiếng bởi sự hám lợi của mình.
data.en_hint: He was known for his acquisitiveness.
data.content_game_1: He was known for his acquisitiveness.
data.answer_en_hint: He was known for his acquisitiveness.

data.trans: (+for sth) Dễ thấy, rõ ràng, đáng chú ý, nổi bật
data.trans_hint: Về nhan sắc, cô ấy chẳng đáng cho người ta chú ý.
data.en_hint: She wasn't exactly conspicuous for her beauty.
data.content_game_1: She wasn't exactly conspicuous for her beauty.
data.answer_en_hint: She wasn't exactly conspicuous for her beauty.

data.trans_hint: Chúng tôi sẽ loại bỏ những cuốn sách cũ.
data.en_hint: We will discard the old books.
data.content_game_1: We will discard the old books.
data.answer_en_hint: We will discard the old books.

data.trans_hint: Cảnh vật nơi đây thật buồn tẻ và xám xịt.
data.en_hint: The landscape was drab and gray.
data.content_game_1: The landscape was drab and gray.
data.answer_en_hint: The landscape was drab and gray.

data.trans_hint: Hàng nghìn món đồ cổ được một nhà sưu tập tích trữ.
data.en_hint: Thousands of antiques were hoarded by a compulsive collector.
data.content_game_1: Thousands of antiques were hoarded by a compulsive collector.
data.answer_en_hint: Thousands of antiques were hoarded by a compulsive collector.

data.trans_hint: Cuốn tiểu thuyết được viết từ kinh nghiệm cá nhân.
data.en_hint: The novel is written from personal experience.
data.content_game_1: The novel is written from personal experience.
data.answer_en_hint: The novel is written from personal experience.

data.trans: Hàng dự trữ, kho dự trữ
data.trans_hint: Chúng tôi có một kho dự trữ vũ khí và đạn dược sẽ dùng được trong vài tháng.
data.en_hint: We have a stockpile of weapons and ammunition that will last several months.
data.content_game_1: We have a stockpile of weapons and ammunition that will last several months.
data.answer_en_hint: We have a stockpile of weapons and ammunition that will last several months.

data.trans: Phong cách ăn mặc thường ngày, không trang trọng
data.trans_hint: Phong cách ăn mặc thường ngày là một dạng phối trang phục của phương Tây, với phong cách thoải mái và phù hợp mặc hàng ngày.
data.en_hint: Casual wear is a Western dress code that is relaxed and suited for everyday use.
data.content_game_1: Casual wear is a Western dress code that is relaxed and suited for everyday use.
data.answer_en_hint: Casual wear is a Western dress code that is relaxed and suited for everyday use.

data.trans_hint: Kính râm với một vài hình dáng cụ thể có thể thành mốt như là một phụ kiện thời trang.
data.en_hint: Sunglasses of particular shapes may be in vogue as a fashion accessory.
